LABEL: 0x1F3
STRING: ――Now then.

LABEL: 0x20B
STRING: The monitors in the wheelhouse displayed various numerical values on the gauges.

LABEL: 0x257
STRING: At the center was a three-dimensional model of the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x286
STRING: And, the remaining power left for the heating.

LABEL: 0x2BE
STRING: ...Seventeen hours remained.

LABEL: 0x2DE
STRING: As soon as the premise of our discussion was set, Yukari opened her mouth.

LABEL: 0x380
STRING: 「I hope you understand that we can't use the rescue ship.」

LABEL: 0x3C0
STRING: 「Reiri-san herself may not be there anymore, but we can't erase the traces of her blood and bodily fluids.」

LABEL: 0x483
STRING: 「――It's contaminated by <COOS>.」

LABEL: 0x4B9
STRING: 「Don't even think about going in there.」

LABEL: 0x4F8
STRING: As she spoke, she marked the rescue ship and emergency room with a cross on the display.

LABEL: 0x54C
STRING: 「...Can't we wear something protective?」

LABEL: 0x5F6
STRING: 「It doesn't matter if you're wearing armor or a diving suit.」

LABEL: 0x624
STRING: 「We might be safe ourselves.」

LABEL: 0x658
STRING: 「However, even if we managed to surface with the rescue ship, how would we get rescued?」

LABEL: 0x6B1
STRING: 「That's――」

LABEL: 0x739
STRING: 「No one can get close to us.」

LABEL: 0x75D
STRING: 「Besides, it's possible that when we take off our protective gear, your skin makes contact with it, and you get infected.」

LABEL: 0x7AD
STRING: 「Once the door of that rescue ship closes, it must never return to the surface again.」

LABEL: 0x7FD
STRING: 「If that door were to be opened back on the surface, disaster would ensue.」

LABEL: 0x868
STRING: She smudged over the rescue ship as she explained.

LABEL: 0x8B0
STRING: But, if the rescue ship couldn't be used no matter what...

LABEL: 0x8EC
STRING: Then there was no other possibility of going to the surface.

LABEL: 0x982
STRING: 「Let's keep up the tempo.」

LABEL: 0x9AA
STRING: 「The <SHEEP III> can't surface.」

LABEL: 0x9D5
STRING: 「We can't use the rescue ship.」

LABEL: 0xA54
STRING: 「Which means... there's only one pressure-resistant thing left.」

LABEL: 0xA97
STRING: 「...The diving suits.」

LABEL: 0xB0C
STRING: Tokiwa nodded.

LABEL: 0xB33
STRING: I had considered the possibility, but...

LABEL: 0xB5B
STRING: There was a mountain of problems with it.

LABEL: 0xC4A
STRING: 「What about buoyancy?」

LABEL: 0xC72
STRING: 「How much does a pressure-resistant diving suit weigh in the first place――」

LABEL: 0xD16
STRING: 「That is known to me.」

LABEL: 0xD3C
STRING: 「I had to do a lot of calculations the day before yesterday.」

LABEL: 0xD79
STRING: Right, it was Tokiwa who had done the pressure resistance calculations for the diving suits.

LABEL: 0xE29
STRING: 「No matter how much weight you reduce, it still weighs no less than 100 kilograms...」

LABEL: 0xE72
STRING: 「Add to that the weight of the person wearing it――」

LABEL: 0xEA6
STRING: 「I'm not sure if you can create enough buoyancy to lift that much weight.」

LABEL: 0xEEC
STRING: 「Any ideas?」

LABEL: 0xFC2
STRING: A sudden silence fell.

LABEL: 0xFE2
STRING: Tokiwa opened her mouth, unable to bear it.

LABEL: 0x102B
STRING: 「If only a turtle would lift us up like it did Urashima Taro.」

LABEL: 0x10CE
STRING: 「Besides, turtles are cute.」

LABEL: 0x117B
STRING: 「I'm just kidding.」

LABEL: 0x11F2
STRING: 「But, even if there are no turtles, a whale or two might pass through here.」

LABEL: 0x124D
STRING: You've got to be kidding me.

LABEL: 0x1273
STRING: Was she seriously going to bet on an idea like that?

LABEL: 0x12A7
STRING: 「That's absurd.」

LABEL: 0x12BF
STRING: 「How do you tie a diving suit to a whale?」

LABEL: 0x130A
STRING: 「Maybe you can cling to it...」

LABEL: 0x1334
STRING: 「Either way, it doesn't look like that'll be a solution.」

LABEL: 0x1379
STRING: If we could cling to a whale and escape, we wouldn't have had this much trouble in the first place.

LABEL: 0x13CD
STRING: Was there anything that created buoyancy?

LABEL: 0x13FD
STRING: Anything――

LABEL: 0x1413
STRING: 「...That's right.」

LABEL: 0x142F
STRING: 「The rescue ship!」

LABEL: 0x14B6
STRING: Yukari narrowed her eyes at my statement.

LABEL: 0x14F1
STRING: 「Were you not listening to me?」

LABEL: 0x152B
STRING: 「We can't use the rescue ship... Didn't I tell you that just now?」

LABEL: 0x1574
STRING: 「That's only if we were to enter the ship itself, right?」

LABEL: 0x15AA
STRING: 「Your point was that the door couldn't be opened even if we surfaced.」

LABEL: 0x1656
STRING: 「That's true, but...」

LABEL: 0x167E
STRING: 「What exactly are you suggesting, then?」

LABEL: 0x16B9
STRING: 「We'll use the rescue ship as a buoyant material.」

LABEL: 0x172C
STRING: 「Wha――」

LABEL: 0x1749
STRING: This was the only way.

LABEL: 0x1765
STRING: The rescue ship was a submarine, albeit a small one.

LABEL: 0x178F
STRING: The space inside might have been contaminated, but it was still filled with air.

LABEL: 0x17D1
STRING: Even though its interior had been destroyed, if we physically let go of the ballast, it would be possible to ascend.

LABEL: 0x182B
STRING: 「How about it, Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0x1930
STRING: 「It's dangerous.」

LABEL: 0x194F
STRING: 「Rescue ships are designed to withstand deep-sea water pressure.」

LABEL: 0x1991
STRING: 「It couldn't be more airtight.」

LABEL: 0x19B7
STRING: 「No matter how vicious <COOS> may be, if the rescue ship were to sink again afterward...」

LABEL: 0x1A75
STRING: 「...That seems like the only possibility.」

LABEL: 0x1AAE
STRING: Tokiwa sat down and took a deep breath.

LABEL: 0x1BB3
STRING: 「Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0x1BCB
STRING: 「Could you tell me about the structure of the rescue ship?」

LABEL: 0x1C10
STRING: 「The ballast tanks are most likely located here.」

LABEL: 0x1C5E
STRING: 「And, the weights would normally be here――」

LABEL: 0x1C99
STRING: A figure of the rescue ship appeared on the radar image.

LABEL: 0x1CCB
STRING: Yukari pointed to its lower part.

LABEL: 0x1CFE
STRING: 「You should be able to detach the weights in case of an emergency or in the event of a malfunction to the internal equipment.」

LABEL: 0x1D6E
STRING: 「I see. And how heavy are the weights?」

LABEL: 0x1DBB
STRING: 「About 600 kilograms.」

LABEL: 0x1E4C
STRING: 「Hmm... There's some leeway.」

LABEL: 0x1E75
STRING: Tokiwa smiled at us.

LABEL: 0x1E97
STRING: We might be able to escape using this plan.

LABEL: 0x1EC9
STRING: The question was how to remove the ballast from the rescue ship.

LABEL: 0x1F14
STRING: 「We have no choice but to do it from outside the ship.」

LABEL: 0x1FFC
STRING: 「However, the only hatch leading outside is...」

LABEL: 0x2049
STRING: ――In the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x2063
STRING: Moreover, the hatch leading outside was blocked by the rescue ship.

LABEL: 0x20B7
STRING: If we were going to use that hatch to go outside, we would also have to completely close the hatch of the rescue ship and fill the interior with air.

LABEL: 0x2129
STRING: We would then disconnect it from the <SHEEP III>, change into a diving suit and detach the ballast from the rescue ship...

LABEL: 0x2192
STRING: 「Either way, the diving suits are also in the emergency room...」

LABEL: 0x2232
STRING: 「Looks like we have no choice but to go there.」

LABEL: 0x225F
STRING: 「Yeah.」

LABEL: 0x22AD
STRING: That's right, there was no other way.

LABEL: 0x233D
STRING: We exited the wheelhouse with trepidation.

LABEL: 0x236D
STRING: And, headed straight for the emergency room――

LABEL: 0x23FA
STRING: 「It's no good――」

LABEL: 0x2416
STRING: We didn't even need to get close.

LABEL: 0x243A
STRING: We just stood there and stared.

LABEL: 0x2466
STRING: It was no good.

LABEL: 0x247C
STRING: Even from a distance, I could tell.

LABEL: 0x249E
STRING: The emergency room...

LABEL: 0x24B4
STRING: The light around its entrance was stagnant.

LABEL: 0x24EA
STRING: Why was the light frozen in that place?

LABEL: 0x2526
STRING: Up until now, the light-bearing creatures had roamed around the ship, hadn't they?

LABEL: 0x2580
STRING: So why――

LABEL: 0x2598
STRING: At that moment, Hiragino's face passed through my mind.

LABEL: 0x25C2
STRING: I shook my head to clear it.

LABEL: 0x25E4
STRING: No.

LABEL: 0x25FA
STRING: Don't think about it.

LABEL: 0x261A
STRING: Nothing good will come of it――

LABEL: 0x2768
STRING: 「From the looks of it... we can't get any closer.」

LABEL: 0x27A5
STRING: 「Is there something we can do about this...?」

LABEL: 0x2839
STRING: 「...I have an idea.」

LABEL: 0x2866
STRING: Tokiwa tugged on my sleeve as she spoke.

LABEL: 0x28DF
STRING: 「Could you come with me to the lab?」

LABEL: 0x2A41
STRING: The deep-sea creatures infected by the light, <COOS>, were gathering in the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x2A93
STRING: That meant there were no obstacles on the way to the laboratory.

LABEL: 0x2ACD
STRING: When we entered the dimly lit laboratory, Tokiwa slowly grabbed a large water tank from the back of the room.

LABEL: 0x2B31
STRING: That was the jellyfish I had brought back from the bottom of the sea――

LABEL: 0x2B69
STRING: Placing the deep aquarium on the laboratory table, she looked at the jellyfish with satisfaction.

LABEL: 0x2C2D
STRING: 「Hello, Jellyfish.」

LABEL: 0x2CE0
STRING: 「Now then, let's get down to business.」

LABEL: 0x2D12
STRING: 「There's something that's been bothering me.」

LABEL: 0x2D56
STRING: 「It's about the ecology of that light――」

LABEL: 0x2D85
STRING: 「The ecology...?」

LABEL: 0x2E0F
STRING: 「Yes.」

LABEL: 0x2E2A
STRING: Tokiwa nodded her head in a nonchalant manner, contrary to the urgency of the situation.

LABEL: 0x2E5E
STRING: Her half-closed eyes slowly turned toward Yukari.

LABEL: 0x2EFC
STRING: 「It's a simple question.」

LABEL: 0x2F18
STRING: 「――Why is that light avoiding Yukari?」

LABEL: 0x2F8A
STRING: Avoiding her?

LABEL: 0x2FA4
STRING: The light was...?

LABEL: 0x2FC0
STRING: That was impossible.

LABEL: 0x2FE6
STRING: That made it sound like Yukari――

LABEL: 0x3028
STRING: I looked at her beside me.

LABEL: 0x30AD
STRING: She turned red like she was offended but couldn't say anything in return.

LABEL: 0x3107
STRING: I didn't have any words to say to her either.

LABEL: 0x313B
STRING: Of course, I didn't think that Yukari was somehow avoiding or even manipulating the light.

LABEL: 0x31A1
STRING: Even I knew that was impossible.

LABEL: 0x31F7
STRING: However, I did think of something...

LABEL: 0x3229
STRING: After Tokiwa pointed out that the light was avoiding only her, I had realized it.

LABEL: 0x3340
STRING: For one, when we first encountered that light...

LABEL: 0x3370
STRING: It ignored Yukari and headed straight for Reiri.

LABEL: 0x344E
STRING: Also, on the first floor of the rear section earlier...

LABEL: 0x3478
STRING: When she shot Touri and chased us away in that room...

LABEL: 0x34BA
STRING: Yukari was trapped in there with all that light, yet she did not appear to have been attacked at all.

LABEL: 0x3520
STRING: No matter how strong she was, and even if she had her speargun, it would not explain it.

LABEL: 0x36A9
STRING: 「Yukari-san...」

LABEL: 0x36C5
STRING: 「What's the meaning of this?」

LABEL: 0x36FE
STRING: 「It's not...」

LABEL: 0x377B
STRING: 「I don't understand it either.」

LABEL: 0x37B2
STRING: 「Don't say you haven't noticed――!」

LABEL: 0x37E5
STRING: 「Now, now.」

LABEL: 0x3801
STRING: 「Don't get so worked up.」

LABEL: 0x3842
STRING: Tokiwa admonished me expressionlessly.

LABEL: 0x3864
STRING: And then, reasoning began to overflow from her mouth.

LABEL: 0x3918
STRING: 「I can think of several reasons...」

LABEL: 0x394C
STRING: 「I can come up with multiple theories, but this is the one that makes the most sense.」

LABEL: 0x3994
STRING: 「The most plausible one.」

LABEL: 0x3A1B
STRING: 「――I think it's because of those shoes.」

LABEL: 0x3A64
STRING: 「The shoes...?!」

LABEL: 0x3A9A
STRING: My eyes naturally lowered to her feet.

LABEL: 0x3AB8
STRING: Yukari and I both were staring at her shoes.

LABEL: 0x3AE8
STRING: ...They were just regular boots.

LABEL: 0x3B08
STRING: All of the attendants wore the same ones, but...

LABEL: 0x3B3A
STRING: They didn't seem to be specially made for them. They were just ordinary boots.

LABEL: 0x3B9C
STRING: Those were what caused the light to avoid her?

LABEL: 0x3BC8
STRING: ...I don't get it.

LABEL: 0x3C58
STRING: 「By the way, Yukari-san...」

LABEL: 0x3C76
STRING: 「You researched magnetosomes in university, right?」

LABEL: 0x3CBE
STRING: 「And you continued that research at ROMLES.」

LABEL: 0x3CF8
STRING: 「――<COOS> has magnetosomes as well, don't you think?」

LABEL: 0x3D4B
STRING: 「...That's correct.」

LABEL: 0x3D6F
STRING: 「But what does that――」

LABEL: 0x3D9C
STRING: 「H-Hey... What are these magnetosomes you keep mentioning?」

LABEL: 0x3DE2
STRING: I understood that Yukari had continued her research from university at ROMLES, and in the process, had learned about <COOS>.

LABEL: 0x3E4A
STRING: But these magnetosomes――

LABEL: 0x3EEC
STRING: 「Magnetic bacteria possessing magnetic organelle――」

LABEL: 0x3F1E
STRING: 「It's a bacteria's compass, so to speak.」

LABEL: 0x3F53
STRING: A compass?

LABEL: 0x3F87
STRING: Having a compass meant understanding the direction of a plane...

LABEL: 0x3FE6
STRING: 「Making a computer out of magnetic bacteria――」

LABEL: 0x401E
STRING: 「Research like that has been going on for over 20 years.」

LABEL: 0x405A
STRING: 「They have a sense of direction both as individuals and as a whole.」

LABEL: 0x4096
STRING: 「Isn't the reason that light is moving in unison like that because they have magnetosomes?」

LABEL: 0x4157
STRING: 「That's what I've been thinking.」

LABEL: 0x4184
STRING: Tokiwa weaved her logic together in an orderly fashion.

LABEL: 0x41AC
STRING: We were bathed in a sea of her thoughts without any stagnation.

LABEL: 0x41F4
STRING: 「I see. That much makes sense.」

LABEL: 0x4222
STRING: 「But the important part is still missing.」

LABEL: 0x4250
STRING: 「What does that have to do with Yukari's shoes?」

LABEL: 0x42EE
STRING: 「Right.」

LABEL: 0x4304
STRING: 「The <SHEEP III> is currently under certain special conditions.」

LABEL: 0x4349
STRING: 「It has been flooded with "water."」

LABEL: 0x4375
STRING: 「The seawater from the rear section, that is.」

LABEL: 0x43AD
STRING: 「In addition, there's also the water from the sprinklers that hasn't been drained yet.」

LABEL: 0x43E9
STRING: 「Even if this is a deep-sea submarine, for there to be this much water inside is abnormal.」

LABEL: 0x4453
STRING: 「And its effect is obvious――」

LABEL: 0x448E
STRING: Saying this, Tokiwa raised her arm straight forward.

LABEL: 0x44C8
STRING: With her index finger, she pointed at me.

LABEL: 0x455A
STRING: 「Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x4574
STRING: 「Your feet have been wet this whole time, correct?」

LABEL: 0x45B0
STRING: 「Thanks to the flooded floor.」

LABEL: 0x45D3
STRING: 「Y...Yeah.」

LABEL: 0x45F1
STRING: Her question was sudden.

LABEL: 0x460B
STRING: I hadn't expected those words.

LABEL: 0x462D
STRING: Not that I felt guilty about something. I just didn't understand the meaning behind her query.

LABEL: 0x468D
STRING: She nodded in satisfaction at my vague affirmation.

LABEL: 0x473D
STRING: 「It's the same for me.」

LABEL: 0x475D
STRING: 「And for everyone else.」

LABEL: 0x4785
STRING: 「Wet feet.」

LABEL: 0x47A7
STRING: 「However, Yukari-san with her boots...」

LABEL: 0x4800
STRING: Her boots were coated in rubber to prevent them from slipping.

LABEL: 0x483E
STRING: Now that I looked at them again, they were clearly different from our shoes.

LABEL: 0x488F
STRING: 「They're clearly made to repel water..」

LABEL: 0x48C4
STRING: 「You're right...」

LABEL: 0x490E
STRING: Magnetic bacteria and a flooded ship.

LABEL: 0x4934
STRING: Gradually, Tokiwa's point began to sink in.

LABEL: 0x49DA
STRING: 「If it's a magnetic bacterium, it can detect magnetic fields...」

LABEL: 0x4A12
STRING: 「A magnetic field changes depending on the electric field.」

LABEL: 0x4A9F
STRING: 「――Based on the above, my hypothesis is as follows:」

LABEL: 0x4AD1
STRING: 「Organisms infected with <COOS>...」

LABEL: 0x4B09
STRING: 「They detect bioelectric currents.」

LABEL: 0x4B33
STRING: 「So, Yukari-san, whose skin was not in direct contact with water...」

LABEL: 0x4B73
STRING: 「You were not chosen as a target, right?」

LABEL: 0x4BD2
STRING: 「That's...」

LABEL: 0x4BF3
STRING: ――It made sense.

LABEL: 0x4C17
STRING: The reason they were acting as a group.

LABEL: 0x4C3F
STRING: The reason why they were attacking us so accurately.

LABEL: 0x4C6F
STRING: The reason Yukari was the only one who wasn't targeted.

LABEL: 0x4C95
STRING: However――

LABEL: 0x4CAD
STRING: 「These bioelectric currents...」

LABEL: 0x4CD5
STRING: 「Are you saying that's all they're using to attack us?」

LABEL: 0x4D1D
STRING: 「They were coming for us from quite a long distance.」

LABEL: 0x4DD9
STRING: 「It's not that strange.」

LABEL: 0x4E14
STRING: Tokiwa held out her palm with a fluttering motion.

LABEL: 0x4E52
STRING: She dismissed my point without a second thought, looking up at me like a folding fan.

LABEL: 0x4EA9
STRING: 「For example... Yes.」

LABEL: 0x4F2C
STRING: 「Are you familiar with Lorenzini organs?」

LABEL: 0x4F5C
STRING: 「It's an electroreceptor that certain shark species have.」

LABEL: 0x4F96
STRING: 「There's a cluster of gelatinous matter deep inside the hundreds of tiny holes in the surface of their heads.」

LABEL: 0x4FEC
STRING: 「With those, they can detect the faintest myoelectric and nerve pulses in fish swimming far away.」

LABEL: 0x5044
STRING: 「Even a current as weak as one-millionth of a volt.」

LABEL: 0x508B
STRING: 「――What's with that number?」

LABEL: 0x50AD
STRING: The units of measurement we'd devised were not all that reliable once we went that small.

LABEL: 0x5103
STRING: One millionth――

LABEL: 0x5128
STRING: Even that unrealistic number, which was too insignificant to be expressed in Arabic numerals, had great significance to sharks.

LABEL: 0x51AB
STRING: 「That's why sharks often attack metal objects.」

LABEL: 0x5254
STRING: 「Oh, come to think of it...」

LABEL: 0x5276
STRING: 「The exploration unit from back then might've been destroyed for that reason as well.」

LABEL: 0x52D0
STRING: 「A very small amount of current was leaking from the cable connecting the exploration unit and the <SHEEP III>...」

LABEL: 0x538A
STRING: 「It's quite possible that a shark picked that up.」

LABEL: 0x53D9
STRING: 「...I'm well aware that sharks are amazing, but...」

LABEL: 0x5421
STRING: 「Does that mean the light can do that as well――?」

LABEL: 0x54BA
STRING: Tokiwa nodded her head in agreement without hesitation.

LABEL: 0x550A
STRING: 「That's the logical conclusion.」

LABEL: 0x5593
STRING: 「Then again――」

LABEL: 0x55B1
STRING: 「The Lorenzini organ I mentioned earlier only detects potential differences.」

LABEL: 0x55F9
STRING: 「The principle is quite different from magnetosomes.」

LABEL: 0x563B
STRING: 「Either way, detecting human bioelectric currents should be easy for them.」

LABEL: 0x56A3
STRING: 「But, Yukari's more knowledgeable in that field than I am, right?」

LABEL: 0x56FE
STRING: Yukari listened to Tokiwa's story in silence.

LABEL: 0x572C
STRING: She was suddenly brought into the conversation as she was holding her elbow in thought.

LABEL: 0x5774
STRING: Yukari started talking, not looking particularly surprised.

LABEL: 0x5810
STRING: 「――You're right. That's what I think too.」

LABEL: 0x5846
STRING: 「However, I'm sorry to disappoint you, but my conclusion doesn't go beyond mere conjecture either.」

LABEL: 0x590B
STRING: 「The biology of organisms infected with <COOS> is still largely unknown, even to ROMLES.」

LABEL: 0x5961
STRING: 「After all, we couldn't bring it up to the surface, so there was no way we could conduct satisfactory experiments...」

LABEL: 0x59D0
STRING: Yukari's words trailed off.

LABEL: 0x59EC
STRING: However, the fact that she and Tokiwa agreed with each other should be enough.

LABEL: 0x5B11
STRING: 「...And that's how it is.」

LABEL: 0x5B3B
STRING: 「We've concluded the best way to escape from those creatures.」

LABEL: 0x5B6F
STRING: 「We don't want to stimulate their receptors.」

LABEL: 0x5BB0
STRING: 「You mean we're fine as long as we don't get detected by their compass?」

LABEL: 0x5C03
STRING: 「That's probably correct.」

LABEL: 0x5C31
STRING: 「But, that's not enough.」

LABEL: 0x5C66
STRING: Tokiwa spoke, raising another finger.

LABEL: 0x5CAD
STRING: 「From what I've seen, it also responds to "light."」

LABEL: 0x5CE9
STRING: 「It doesn't just emit its own.」

LABEL: 0x5D13
STRING: 「They have a habit of gathering wherever there's light...」

LABEL: 0x5DAE
STRING: 「Right, Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0x5DDF
STRING: 「There's no mistaking it.」

LABEL: 0x5E0E
STRING: This time she nodded deeply, leaving no room for doubt.

LABEL: 0x5E7A
STRING: Tokiwa gave her a quick glance, then embraced the aquarium again.

LABEL: 0x5F32
STRING: 「As I thought...」

LABEL: 0x5F4E
STRING: 「It was odd to begin with.」

LABEL: 0x5F7C
STRING: 「There's no rhythm to this bioluminescence.」

LABEL: 0x6007
STRING: 「Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x6026
STRING: Tokiwa called out my name as she gazed at the jellyfish with utmost devotion.

LABEL: 0x6070
STRING: 「What's up?」

LABEL: 0x609B
STRING: 「Please lend me your watch for a moment.」

LABEL: 0x60D2
STRING: 「Sure...」

LABEL: 0x60EC
STRING: My watch...?

LABEL: 0x6104
STRING: No, there was no point in thinking about it.

LABEL: 0x6130
STRING: It would be more efficient to wait for her explanation without thinking too hard about it,

LABEL: 0x6180
STRING: rather than trying to follow her unique trail of logic.

LABEL: 0x61BC
STRING: I quickly removed my wristwatch and threw it to Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x626C
STRING: 「Now, if you just bring a light close to <COOS> like this――」

LABEL: 0x62BF
STRING: Tokiwa pressed the button on the watch several times, making the clock's backlight glow.

LABEL: 0x63A8
STRING: 「They return the flickering.」

LABEL: 0x63CC
STRING: 「I suspect this is a retraction phenomenon seen in various bioluminescent species, such as fireflies.」

LABEL: 0x6424
STRING: 「I came up with some models based on that assumption.」

LABEL: 0x64C3
STRING: 「But――」

LABEL: 0x64DF
STRING: 「There's something strange.」

LABEL: 0x6505
STRING: 「Because there's no governing equation for this light.」

LABEL: 0x6547
STRING: 「It doesn't follow the Van der Pol equation either.」

LABEL: 0x657B
STRING: 「There doesn't even appear to be a limit cycle.」

LABEL: 0x65B9
STRING: 「――The trajectories of this light do not converge.」

LABEL: 0x65F4
STRING: 「What are you talking about, Tokiwa?」

LABEL: 0x6622
STRING: Tokiwa's words gradually became more and more quiet, as if she was talking to herself.

LABEL: 0x6672
STRING: The trajectories of the light didn't converge?

LABEL: 0x6696
STRING: I wasn't sure what that meant, but she looked at me with a serious expression.

LABEL: 0x6756
STRING: 「It means that this bioluminescence is unprecedented.」

LABEL: 0x6798
STRING: 「It clearly responds to external light and returns some kind of pattern in response.」

LABEL: 0x67F8
STRING: 「But, I don't see any regularity there.」

LABEL: 0x682E
STRING: 「It's like a language that doesn't have a specific closed trajectory.」

LABEL: 0x6876
STRING: 「This luminescence has a sense of "free will."」

LABEL: 0x68B3
STRING: 「Free will――」

LABEL: 0x68D1
STRING: Did that mean the bacteria were conscious?

LABEL: 0x68FF
STRING: A parasitic, mysterious light like that――

LABEL: 0x6A04
STRING: 「...We know that <COOS> communicates through light.」

LABEL: 0x6A62
STRING: 「It clearly reacts strangely to other light sources...」

LABEL: 0x6AFF
STRING: 「Tokiwa-san is right.」

LABEL: 0x6B3C
STRING: 「...Perhaps they think of light as a sort of companion.」

LABEL: 0x6B82
STRING: 「So they send a "message" to it in response.」

LABEL: 0x6BCC
STRING: 「And, if they don't receive a reply back――」

LABEL: 0x6C0D
STRING: Tokiwa turned on the watch's light again.

LABEL: 0x6C3B
STRING: The jellyfish did not, however, emit any light at all this time.

LABEL: 0x6C98
STRING: 「They assume that "This isn't a friend," and fall silent.」

LABEL: 0x6D31
STRING: 「That concludes my hypothesis, which I have discovered through observation.」

LABEL: 0x6D71
STRING: 「Thank you very much for your attention.」

LABEL: 0x6D9A
STRING: Tokiwa bowed her head.

LABEL: 0x6DC4
STRING: Yukari probably understood everything, whereas I could only grasp the bigger picture of her explanation.

LABEL: 0x6E12
STRING: After a short round of applause, Yukari continued in a somewhat excited tone.

LABEL: 0x6ECC
STRING: 「That was brilliant.」

LABEL: 0x6EF2
STRING: 「We knew that organisms infected with <COOS> seem to react to light.」

LABEL: 0x6F2E
STRING: 「They gather to it, and in some cases, attack.」

LABEL: 0x6F8B
STRING: 「So, that's why you were trying to keep light from leaking out of the ship.」

LABEL: 0x7057
STRING: 「Aside from exploration units and the like, the principle was to keep light from leaking out.」

LABEL: 0x70B6
STRING: Not even a little...?

LABEL: 0x70D0
STRING: How was that even possible?

LABEL: 0x7120
STRING: What the hell was she talking about?

LABEL: 0x714A
STRING: 「There's no way you can prevent all light from leaking out, is there?」

LABEL: 0x7188
STRING: 「How is it possible to block out all light――」

LABEL: 0x7238
STRING: 「Haven't you noticed?」

LABEL: 0x7266
STRING: 「Ever since this ship sank, not an ounce of light has leaked outside from this ship.」

LABEL: 0x72D1
STRING: She stated that as if it was a fact and not conjecture.

LABEL: 0x730F
STRING: If that was possible, then――

LABEL: 0x736F
STRING: I turned towards Yukari, imploring her.

LABEL: 0x7393
STRING: She did not offer any explanations or additions, but simply nodded her head.

LABEL: 0x743F
STRING: 「――She's right.」

LABEL: 0x745D
STRING: 「There's nothing to hide at this point.」

LABEL: 0x7491
STRING: 「Strictly speaking, there are no windows on this ship.」

LABEL: 0x74C9
STRING: 「I'm sure you're aware that some of the windows are just displays, but...」

LABEL: 0x751F
STRING: 「Every single window is like that.」

LABEL: 0x7558
STRING: 「W-What―」

LABEL: 0x7578
STRING: ...So that's what it was.

LABEL: 0x759A
STRING: That's why I couldn't see this ship from the outside during my deep-sea exploration, even though there were supposed to be windows.

LABEL: 0x75FE
STRING: It would be extremely difficult to find the <SHEEP III> in that deep, dark sea, absent of light.

LABEL: 0x766F
STRING: Why had they made the ship this way...? It must have been because of <COOS>.

LABEL: 0x7733
STRING: 「It was just in case, but...」

LABEL: 0x775B
STRING: 「We didn't want to attract any organisms infected with <COOS>.」

LABEL: 0x77AC
STRING: 「So, the deep sea we saw in the observation deck the day before yesterday...! Can you switch back to that image easily?」

LABEL: 0x787E
STRING: 「Ah, no, at that time, it was in normal window mode.」

LABEL: 0x78BA
STRING: 「The ability to keep the light from leaking outside is just an emergency protective function.」

LABEL: 0x7910
STRING: 「When we descend deep enough, and the light level drops below 0.7%% of that on the surface, all windows automatically switch to that mode.」

LABEL: 0x799E
STRING: To think they had a countermeasure like that...

LABEL: 0x7AA5
STRING: 「But, I'm surprised you figured it out.」

LABEL: 0x7AD1
STRING: 「We were constantly getting images from cameras outside the ship and having them rendered on the windows, so...」

LABEL: 0x7B27
STRING: 「I thought no one would notice...」

LABEL: 0x7B76
STRING: 「It was because I kept seeing weird colors every time I looked outside.」

LABEL: 0x7BB7
STRING: Tokiwa said it simply.

LABEL: 0x7BE3
STRING: I couldn't even feel anything out of place with her words anymore.

LABEL: 0x7C23
STRING: What all could she see with her eyes, I wondered――

LABEL: 0x7CD3
STRING: 「...Now then, let me summarize what we've learned.」

LABEL: 0x7D4A
STRING: Tokiwa raised two fingers like a peace sign.

LABEL: 0x7DF6
STRING: 「Light and electricity.」

LABEL: 0x7E12
STRING: 「If we don't provide it these two physical stimuli...」

LABEL: 0x7E4D
STRING: 「The light won't recognize us.」

LABEL: 0x7EDA
STRING: 「...That's how I feel.」

LABEL: 0x7F05
STRING: It was only a guess.

LABEL: 0x7F27
STRING: Contrary to her tone, however, her eyes were filled with conviction.

LABEL: 0x7FD1
STRING: 「The necessary conditions have been met.」

LABEL: 0x7FFB
STRING: 「I don't know if that's enough, but that's all I can tell you.」

LABEL: 0x8055
STRING: 「The rest is up to Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0x8082
STRING: 「...All right.」

LABEL: 0x809C
STRING: 「Thank you, Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0x80C0
STRING: 「This possibility... is worth betting on.」

LABEL: 0x810E
STRING: <COOS> was an unknown and unidentified entity.

LABEL: 0x815A
STRING: But thanks to Tokiwa and Yukari, I think I was beginning to see it... albeit faintly.

LABEL: 0x81AA
STRING: There was no time to discuss any further.

LABEL: 0x81DC
STRING: The clock on the wall showed it was 13:00.

LABEL: 0x8202
STRING: ――Okay, we should be able to do it.

LABEL: 0x8228
STRING: We had to.

LABEL: 0x8248
STRING: I declared in a loud voice.

LABEL: 0x826E
STRING: 「Let's go retrieve those diving suits.」
